biotools.summary: The Ultra-fast Read Mapper (URMAP) is ~10x faster than BWA with comparable accuracy on benchmark tests. URMAP offers faster options when when very high accuracy is not essential. In such applications, speeds ~20x faster than BWA can be achieved (up to ~1M reads per second on a 24-core server).
